amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for the Capitol Visitor Center by $243,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-426 to reduce the funding for the Capitol Visitor Center by $243,000, returning it to FY14 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 212 (Roll no. 190).
